thread.title: Gitex Shopper 'live': Last day... last minute... crazy deals
thread.title_full: Gitex Shopper 'live': Last day... last minute... crazy deals

author: Sneha May Francis
title: Gitex Shopper 'live': Last day... last minute... crazy deals
text: Gitex Shopper 'live': Last day... last minute... crazy deals Buy a smartphone, get another free By Published Saturday, October 10, 2015 While the smartphone biggies are still hogging the limelight at Gitex Shopper, the other “lesser known” smartphones aren’t being ignored either. Retailers have smartly clubbed some of them together to tempt customers with the buy-one-get-one-free offers. “They might be lesser known, but their specs are top-of-the-range,” explains a seller. “Who doesn’t want two phones for the price of one?” asked another seller. “I just bought the Lava phone, and got another free. Two phones for Dh499 is a killer deal,” beamed happy buyer Ratish. Every retailer worth their salt has these offers, with Microsoft’s Lumia and Indian brand Lava topping the list. At Jumbo, when you buy Microsoft smartphone Lumia 640 for Dh799, you get the Lumina 540 for free. Emax has put up a range of Microsoft smartphones on these crazy double deals. “Buy any of our Microsoft phones – Lumia 640 XL, Lumia 540, Lumia 535) and get the same one for free,” informed a seller. Ranging from Dh549 to Dh1,099, these are 5inches screen-sized phones, with 5MP, 8MP and 13MP front camera. SharafDG offers not two but three Lumia smartphones for Dh999. Added to that, you get a Dh500 cash voucher for cleartrip travel website. They also double up Lava for Dh599. “For every Lava Pixel V2+, you get another phone free,” informed a seller. Smartphones with 5inch screen and 13mp front camera is popular among the student community. These phones come with memory card and a car charger.
